Author: Jackson#1309
Content: Wait how is mining with an ASIC possible and profitable if it’s « ASIC proof »

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Notary Nodes mine 75% of blocks, ao ASIC cannot get 51% of hash power

Author: Jackson#1309
Content: So ASICS can mine it but with only about half of their hashpower?

Author: xRobeSx#5136
Content: Full hash power, you’re just only able to compete for 1/4th of the blocks

Author: xRobeSx#5136
Content: Feel free to join my pool @Jackson http://pool.komodo.services  asic’s are welcome

Author: xRobeSx#5136
Content: There are a few on there now mining

Author: Jackson#1309
Content: Ohh so the asics are competing in their own « field » basically?

Author: xRobeSx#5136
Content: Somewhat. Consensus rules state NN’s will mine ~75% the rest go to external miners. So gpu/ASICS are all competing for those other 25%

Author: Jackson#1309
Content: Thank you!!

Author: xRobeSx#5136
Content: No problem

Author: Jackson#1309
Content: Also does anyone know the total hashrate of ASICS on KMD so I can see the competition I’d be up against or if there’s a pool for just ASICS

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: Nethash is currently 5.2Mhash

Author: Jackson#1309
Content: Thats including gpu’s I believe though

Author: Jackson#1309
Content: Does anyone know how much is just asics

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: There is no way to know I think

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: And they are all in the same 'pool'

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: asics and gpu battle for the same remaining 25% of blocks

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: So if you have some asics points them at kmd and take those blocks 😃

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: Better for the network as more hashpower makes the network more secure

Author: Jackson#1309
Content: Alright thanks!!

Author: Jackson#1309
Content: What gets the other 75% of blocks

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: 64 notary nodes

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: The notary nodes are elected each year and run for an entire year

Author: Yassin#3685
Content: https://notarystats.info/votelist.php

Author: xRobeSx#5136
Content: Network Hash/s: 5.58 MSol/s 😃 going up

Author: Jackson#1309
Content: Nice! Does anyone know if they plan to continue asic acceptance?

Author: xRobeSx#5136
Content: yes, asic's aren't going anywhere

Author: xRobeSx#5136
Content: they keep KMD even more secured

Author: xRobeSx#5136
Content: james has confirmed this as well

Author: Jackson#1309
Content: Awesome thanks! This community has been very helpful! Thank you all!

Author: xRobeSx#5136
Content: Stick around, you'll learn a lot and love KMD.

Author: Cryptoon#3362
